name: Idle Supermarket Tycoon
summary: Start with a mini-mart and turn it into a major supermarket business. Build a bakery, sell fruit and vegetables, offer high-quality fish and meat. Run your own perfume and electronics departments. Become the best supermarket manager. Hire sellers and make them increase your sales and profits. Set the salary of the employees from different departments. Develop different marketing strategies to attract potential and existing customers. Choose the best products and improve your research to offer the best deals to your customers.
